metadata.dc:description: At times, a patient's capacity to store urine fails. When dealing with this circumstance, and bearing in mind Primary Health Care Center nurses' responsibilities, the elaboration of a protocol becomes justified, especially in light of the fact that virtually no Spanish bibliography on this topic exists. The aforementioned protocol will be revised in August 2013. This project won the Third Betadine Nursing Prize in 2008.
metadata.dc:title: Betadine como antiséptico para el recambio de sonda suprapública u,ia en Atención Primaria de Salud.
[Betadine as an antiseptic during replacement of suprapubic catheter in primary health care].
